article.title: Badtrans
article.paragraph: BadTransis a maliciousMicrosoft Windowscomputer wormdistributed bye-mail. Because of a known vulnerability in older versions ofInternet Explorer, some e-mail programs, such as Microsoft'sOutlook ExpressandMicrosoft Outlookprograms, may install and execute the worm as soon as the e-mail message is viewed.

Once executed, the worm replicates by sending copies of itself to other e-mail addresses found on the host's machine, and installs akeystroke loggingkeystroke logger, which then captures everything typed on the affected computer. Badtrans then transmits the data to one of several e-mail addresses.cite webKevin Houle, Chad Dougherty W32/BadTrans Worm http://www.cert.org/incident_notes/IN-2001-14.html 2001-11-27 2001-12-01 http://web.archive.org/web/20011217014735/http://www.cert.org/incident_notes/IN-2001-14.html17 December 2001no

Among the e-mail addresses that received the keyloggers were free addresses atExcite,Yahoo!Yahoo, and IJustGotFired.com. IJustGotFired is a free service ofMonkeyBrains, aSan Francisco-basedInternet service provider.The target address at IJustGotFired began receiving e-mails at 3:23pm on November 24, 2001. Once the account exceeded its quotas, it was automatically disabled, but the messages were still saved as they arrived. The address received over 100,000 keylogs in the first day alone.cite webHOPE Wiki H2K2/Talks http://wiki.hope.net/H2K2/Talks#Magic_Lantern_and_Other_Evil_Things 2010-06-21

In mid-December, theFBIcontactedRudy Rucker, Jr., owner of MonkeyBrains, and requested a copy of the keylogged data. All of that data was stolen from the victims of the worm; it includes no information about the creator of Badtrans.Instead of complying with the FBI request, MonkeyBrains published a database website http://badtrans.monkeybrains.net for the public to determine if a given address has been compromised. The database does not reveal the actual passwords or keylogged data.cite webA.C. Thompson Directing traffic http://www.sfbg.com/36/12/fbi.html 2000-12-18 2011-01-11
